properties.areaDesc: Marengo, AL; Tuscaloosa, AL; Greene, AL; Hale, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 11 at 3:47AM CST until February 13 at 5:08AM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the Black Warrior River At Holt
Lock and Dam...
...The flood warning continues for the Black Warrior River At Selden
Lock and Dam...

.Heavy rainfall over the past 24 hours is producing rises along the
Black Warrior River basin...a flood warning remains in effect for
the Black Warrior River at Holt Lock and Dam, and at Selden Lock and
Dam.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Black Warrior River At Holt Lock and Dam.
* from early this morning to late Wednesday night...or until the
warning is cancelled.
* At  2:45 AM Tuesday the stage was 139.7 feet.
* Flood stage is 140.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by early this morning and
continue to rise to near 144.4 feet by after midnight tonight . The
river will fall below flood stage by tomorrow afternoon .
* Impact...At 146.0 feet...Industrial flooding becomes more serious as
the Black Warrior River continues to rise.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Tuesday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
